scripts.lint: npm run lint:css && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:md

scripts.serve: cd docs && bundle exec jekyll serve
scripts.build: cd docs && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.validate: npm run build && npm run lint && npm run test
